Title: Sex, Party and Lies
Writer: Alfonso Albacete (screenplay), Ángeles González Sinde (screenplay), David Menkes (screenplay)
Actors: Mario Casas, Ana de Armas, Yon González, Hugo Silva
Plot: A youth group is preparing for what the summer of their lives will be, including secrets, lies, pickups, sex, confusion, and especially great night party. Most teenagers are not aware that ...
